title: Personal Portfolio
description: Responsive portfolio built with React, Vite, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Senior Citizen Object Detection System Using YOLOv8
description: Developed a smart walking stick leveraging the YOLOv8 object detection model

title: Heart Disease Prediction with Severity Levels
description: Led the development of an AI-powered heart disease prediction system, classifying severity levels using neural networks, K-means clustering, and gradient descent.

title: Smart Loan Application Platform
description: Engineered a scalable loan application system using a microservices architecture, featuring two dedicated services: The User Service allows customers to apply for loans, seamlessly transmitting applications to the Employee Service via RabbitMQ for reliable, asynchronous processing

title: Personalized News Aggregator App
description: Built a Personalized News Aggregator application with Angular frontend and Spring Boot backend, delivering real-time news from multiple APIs with an intuitive user interface.

title: Personalized NOC Builder for YCCE College
description: Generate a personalized No Objection Certificate (NOC) PDF for students of Yeshwantrao Chavan College of Engineering (YCCE).
